import React, { useState } from 'react' import './AddSystem.css' function AddSystem({ PostInfoSystem }) { const [Score, SetScore] = useState(false); const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: '', gateway: '' }) const OpenForm = () => { SetScore(true) } const CloseForm = () => { SetScore(false) } const changeHandler = event => { setForm({ ...form, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } const addForm = () => { PostInfoSystem('POST', { ...form }) SetScore(false) } return (
{ Score ?
Добавление новой ИС
: false }
) } export default AddSystem
